summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing overtime staffing details at a correctional facility for the nights of August 9-10, 2019. The emails involve Bureau of Prisons personnel clarifying volunteer versus mandated overtime assignments, with a note that the information was verified with an individual referred to as 'M'.

persons.name: Hugh Hurwitz
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (HHurwitz@bop.gov) in an email chain discussing overtime staffing details at a correctional facility.

connections.description: Implied professional relationship where the sender verified overtime staffing information with M before relaying it to Hugh Hurwitz.

events.title: Overtime staffing on August 9
events.description: Overtime shift from 4 pm to 12 am with 6 staff hired for overtime, all of whom were volunteers.

events.title: Overtime staffing on August 10
events.description: Overtime shift from 12 am to 8 am with 10 staff hired for overtime; 9 were volunteers and 1 (a Correctional Officer) was mandated.

keyFacts: The email chain discusses overtime staffing details for a correctional facility on August 9-10, 2019.
On August 9, 2019, all 6 overtime staff were volunteers.
On August 10, 2019, 9 of 10 overtime staff were volunteers, with 1 Correctional Officer mandated.
The information was verified with an individual referred to as 'M' before being sent to Hugh Hurwitz.
